headline: Eaton’s "Factories as a Grid" Approach Helps Manufacturing Companies Advance Energy Security for More Affordable, Resilient Power
summary: CLEVELAND, OH / ACCESS Newswire / June 23, 2025 / Electricity is the backbone of modern industrial operations and digitalization provides new opportunities to optimize energy systems. Intelligent power management company Eaton is empowering customers ...
